actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish a Federal Facilities Energy Efficiency Bank to improve energy efficiency in federally owned and leased facilities, and for other purposes.
short_title: Federal Energy Efficiency Bank Establishment Act

summary.text: Federal Energy Efficiency Bank Establishment Act - Establishes in the Treasury the Federal Facilities Energy Efficiency Bank to fund a program of loans to Federal agencies for energy efficiency projects. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Federal Energy Efficiency Bank Establishment Act
A bill to establish a Federal Facilities Energy Efficiency Bank to improve energy efficiency in federally owned and leased facilities, and for other purposes.
